location.english: You can find that shit at:

forkedrepo.english: {name} is a forked {language} repo with {open_issues} unresolved issues [{forks}F {watchers}W]

unforkedrepo.english: {name} is a {language} repo with {open_issues} unresolved issues [{forks}F {watchers}W]

commitcountboring.english: My code has been committed {count} times.

commitcountfun.english: My repository has the same number of commits as {fact} ({count}).
